mapper.select: SELECT RANK, CAL_NO, USER_NO, CH_NO, CAL_STDT, CAL_EDT, CAL_PRICE, CAL_VAT, AMOUNT_PRICE, CAL_TY, ACC_NM, BANK_NM, ACCOUNT, USER_ID, USER_NM FROM(SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY C.CAL_STDT DESC) RANK, C.*, USER_ID, USER_NM FROM CALCULATE C JOIN MEMBER M ON(C.USER_NO = M.USER_NO)) ORDER BY RANK ASC
mapper.update: UPDATE CALCULATE SET CAL_EDT = SYSDATE, CAL_TY = '완료' WHERE CAL_NO = #{calNo}

SELECT L.CH_NM, M.USER_ID FROM LOGER L JOIN MEMBER M ON(L.USER_NO = M.USER_NO) JOIN ATTACHMENT A ON(L.USER_NO = A.USER_NO) WHERE A.AM_TY = '회원'
SELECT SUM(C.AMOUNT_PRICE) AS PRICE FROM LOGER L JOIN CALCULATE C ON(L.CH_NO = C.CH_NO)
SELECT SUM(RE_COUNT), SUM(C_COUNT) FROM LOGER L JOIN REPORT R ON(L.USER_NO = R.RE_TARGET)
